prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking:  Did Stefan have any prophetic dreams, awakenings, or realizations about his current life path and direction last night, or today, If so, has he made a decision about it?

Stefan should be represented by the 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking:  Did Stefan have any prophetic dreams, awakenings, or realizations about his current life path and direction last night, or today, If so, has he made a decision about it?

Stefan should be represented by the 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant. 

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house placement.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a methodical list of the chart data—as displayed in the horary chart—that are relevant under horary principles for your question about Stefan’s prophetic or transformative experiences. (Remember: Stefan is indicated by the 9th house energy, which in the cross‐reference corresponds with his 12th house presence; Melissa is represented by the Ascendant.)

1. Planetary Positions (with specific degrees and known rulership indications):
 • Sun: 14° Aquarius
 • Moon: 9° Aries
 • Mercury: 9° Aquarius
 • Venus: 28°45′ Pisces
 • Mars: 19°58′ Cancer (retrograde)
 • Jupiter: 11°17′ Gemini (retrograde)
 • Saturn: 17°36′ Pisces
 • Uranus: 23°15′ Taurus
 • Neptune: 28°00′ Pisces
 • Pluto: 2°06′ Aquarius
 • North Node: 29°46′ Pisces (retrograde)
 • Chiron: 19°33′ Aries

2. House Boundaries (as provided):
 • Ascendant (Melissa’s point): 11° Taurus
 • 9th House (starting at 5° Capricorn) – by directive, representing Stefan’s “foreign” or transcendent energy; note the cross‐reference places his personal equivalent in his 12th house.
 • 10th House: 22° Capricorn (contains Mercury and Pluto)
 • 11th House: 14° Aquarius (contains Sun and Saturn)
 • 12th House: 20° Pisces (contains Moon, Venus, Neptune, North Node, and Chiron)

3. Major Aspects (with noted orbs where especially tight):
 • Moon Sextile Mercury (orb 0°)
 • Venus Conjunct Neptune (orb 0°)
 • Neptune Conjunct North Node (orb 1°)
 • Venus Conjunct North Node (orb 1°)
 • Uranus Sextile IC (orb 1°)
 • Uranus Trine MC (orb 1°)
 • Moon Sextile Jupiter (orb 2°)
 • Mercury Square Ascendant (orb 2°)
 • Mars Square Chiron (orb 0°)
 • Mars Trine Saturn (orb 2°)
 • Mercury Trine Jupiter (orb 2°)
 • Pluto Sextile North Node (orb 3°)
 • Chiron Square IC (orb 3°)
 • Chiron Square MC (orb 3°)
 • Sun Square Ascendant (orb 3°)
 • Mars Opposition MC (orb 3°)
 • Mars Conjunct IC (orb 3°)
 • Sun Trine Jupiter (orb 3°)
 • Mars Sextile Uranus (orb 4°)
 • Venus Sextile Pluto (orb 4°)
 • Uranus Sextile Neptune (orb 5°)
 • Saturn Sextile MC (orb 5°)
 • Venus Sextile Uranus (orb 5°)
 • Sun Sextile Chiron (orb 5°)
 • Sun Sextile Moon (orb 5°)
 • Sun Conjunct Mercury (orb 5°)
 • Saturn Trine IC (orb 5°)
 • Neptune Sextile MC (orb 6°)
 • Saturn Sextile Ascendant (orb 6°)
 • Saturn Sextile Uranus (orb 6°)
 • Venus Sextile MC (orb 6°)
 • Jupiter Square Saturn (orb 6°)
 • Neptune Trine IC (orb 6°)
 • Venus Trine IC (orb 6°)
 • Mercury Conjunct Pluto (orb 7°)

4. Patterns Noted in the Chart:
 • T-Square Formation:
  – Involving MC (22° Capricorn), Chiron (19° Aries), and IC (22° Cancer)
  – Mars in Cancer on the Nadir forms a linking tone; this pattern typically indicates dynamic tension between public identity (MC), personal vulnerabilities or healing (Chiron), and the inner self or foundation (IC).
 • Cradle Patterns: (Two noted variations)
  – One involves Mars (19° Cancer), MC (22° Capricorn), Neptune (28° Pisces), Uranus (23° Taurus), Venus (28° Pisces), and IC (22° Cancer)
  – Another involves Mars (19° Cancer), MC (22° Capricorn), Saturn (17° Pisces), Uranus (23° Taurus), and IC (22° Cancer)
  – These formations suggest support for sudden, possibly fated shifts as well as the interplay between intuitive/mystical insights (Neptune, Venus) and structural or karmic patterns (Saturn).

5. Additional Noteworthy Features:
 • Moon is a waxing crescent, implying the emergence of new insight or a subtle opening to fresh understanding.
 • The chart forms a Bowl shape, with many planets clustered in the top left quadrant; this factor points toward a concentrated focus on internal dynamics and hidden/emerging processes.
 • Many of the key planets for transcendental or subconscious matters (Venus, Neptune, North Node, Chiron) fall in the 12th House, underscoring themes related to hidden realms, dreams, and sudden intuitive awakenings.

This compilation of positions, aspects, and chart patterns provides the factual groundwork for assessing whether Stefan experienced any prophetic dreams or related internal awakenings (and if a decision followed). Further interpretation can proceed from these listed elements.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Based on the chart configuration and applying strict horary principles, several factors point toward a notable prophetic experience relating to Stefan's life path.

1. Transcendent Influences:
 • The predominance of Pisces in the twelfth house—housing Venus, Neptune, North Node, and Chiron—signals that subtle, intuitive and sometimes painful revelations have entered his inner realm. These placements often correlate with vivid dreams and inner awakenings that guide one toward a deeper spiritual understanding.
 • The Moon in Aries as a waxing crescent underscores a new insight emerging from the subconscious, suggesting that a fresh, prophetic vision or dream has opened a window to the awareness of his inner calling.

2. Tension and Resolution Dynamics:
 • The T-square linking the MC (public direction), Chiron (wounds and healing), and the IC (inner foundation) reflects an inherent tension between his life’s established path and an undercurrent that demands healing and change. With Mars on the Nadir connecting these points, the chart implies that an intimation arose which forced him to confront previously unacknowledged pain or unfulfilled potential.
 • Mars’ square to Chiron confirms that this awakening may have carried an edge of discomfort or a necessary fracture in his old ways, a break from the status quo that, while unsettling, opens the door for transformative decision-making.

3. Communicative and Rational Confirmations:
 • Mercury’s presence in Aquarius, especially when interacting with the Moon and forming a trine with Jupiter, indicates that the mental clarity accompanying this dream or insight was supported by rational thought. This alignment suggests that the experience was not solely mystical in nature but was processed in a way that enabled him to evaluate its transformative potential.
 • The aspect of Mercury square to the Ascendant hints that while the message might have been clear internally, there could be challenges in communicating or integrating that realization outwardly—pointing toward an internal decision rather than immediate external action.

4. Structural and Karmic Support:
 • The supportive trine between Mars and Saturn stabilizes the disruptive energy generated by the awakening, indicating that once the prophetic message was received, Stefan likely synthesized it into a measured, if still evolving, decision regarding his current life path.
 • The presence of the Cradle patterns, involving Neptune, Venus, Saturn, and Uranus along with Mars and the pivotal angles (IC and MC), further underscores a nurturing yet challenging framework. This suggests that his inner vision was given a supportive structure—even though its full manifestation in his external world may require further time and assimilation.

Conclusion of the Interpretation:
The totality of the horary chart indicates that Stefan indeed experienced a prophetic or revelatory moment, likely manifesting as a vivid or symbolic dream, which stirred significant internal shifts. The interplay between subconscious intuitions (twelfth house influences) and the tension inherent in the T-square suggests that he confronted personal vulnerabilities and recognized an urgent need to realign his life path. Although the decision-making process appears to reside in a stage of internal resolution, the supportive influence of Mars trine Saturn suggests that a concrete decision has begun to crystallize within him. That decision may currently be internal, manifesting as a strong inclination toward transformative change, even if it has not yet fully emerged into outward actions.

The chart confirms the prophetic experience and the foundational beginnings of a decision, indicating that Stefan is on the cusp of reorienting his life in line with deeper, perhaps karmic, insights.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Are there any timing indicators in the chart that allude to when this decision may manifest outwardly?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Key timing factors in the chart include the following:

• The Moon in Aries as a waxing crescent indicates fresh, budding insights – its early stage suggests that initial external manifestations of the inner decision may become visible quickly, within days.

• Mercury, with its rapid motion and supportive aspects (notably the sextile with the Moon and trine with Jupiter), implies a swift transmission of the insight into communication or external expression.

• The T-square tension between the MC, Chiron, and the IC hints that the breakthrough—once integrated—could align with a turning point in the chart. This factor often coincides with the next significant transit to the Ascendant or MC, potentially within a few days to a couple of weeks.

• The stabilizing influence of the Mars–Saturn trine suggests that while the decision is emerging, its full external manifestation might require a short period of consolidation before it can be displayed outwardly.

Based on these elements, the indication is that Stefan’s decision is likely to show outward signs within the next several days to a fortnight.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Did Stefan have any prophetic dreams, awakenings, or realizations about his current life path and direction last night, or today, If so, has he made a decision about it?  Redone with 03mini, much better results.
swipes: Did Stefan have any prophetic dreams, awakenings, or realizations about his current life path and direction last night, or today, If so, has he made a decision about it?  Redone with 03mini, much better results.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Are there any indicators in the chart that allude to what this decision is?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
The chart, when considered holistically, indicates that the decision Stefan reached is one of inner transformation rather than a straightforward, external action. Notable factors include:

• The heavy twelfth‐house emphasis (with Venus, Neptune, North Node, and Chiron) suggests that his new insight was rooted deeply in the subconscious realms, urging him to abandon or reconfigure current habits or structures that no longer serve his spiritual evolution.

• The T-square involving the MC (public identity), Chiron (wounds and healing), and the IC (core foundation) points toward a decision aimed at healing past vulnerabilities. This indicates a clear-cut transformation: an internal resolution to restructure his life’s foundation in order to better align with his emerging inner truths.

• The interplay between Mars and Saturn—specifically their trine—suggests that although the awakening came with a degree of discomfort (as indicated by Mars’ square to Chiron), Stefan has opted for a measured approach. He is likely resolving to integrate this disruptive inspiration into a more disciplined, long-term recalibration of his priorities.

• With Neptune and the North Node influencing the twelfth house, the decision has a fated, almost mystical quality. It implies a deliberate choice to follow a path that may require him to let go of established paradigms and move toward a more spiritually authentic, even if isolated, existence.

Thus, the indicators point to an internal decision: Stefan is choosing to undertake a deep personal and spiritual reorientation—one that involves healing old wounds and restructuring his inner foundation—so that his outer life may eventually reflect this profound inner shift.

Thus, the indicators point to an internal decision: Stefan is choosing to undertake a deep personal and spiritual reorientation—one that involves healing old wounds and restructuring his inner foundation—so that his outer life may eventually reflect this profound inner shift.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Are there any indicators in the chart that show how this decision may impact me or whether or not if it includes me?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Analyzing the chart with your Ascendant as your anchor, several factors suggest how Stefan’s decision may reverberate in your sphere:

1. Mercury’s Square to the Ascendant indicates that the communication of his internal shift may not be smooth—it could manifest as misunderstandings or subtle tensions that affect how you perceive his new direction. This aspect suggests that while his transformation is primarily internal, its ripple effect may create a sense of uncertainty for you.

2. The reinforcing influence of Saturn Sextile your Ascendant offers a stabilizing counterbalance. It implies that despite any discomfort arising from his changes, a grounding force is at work in your life. This support may help you manage the evolving dynamic without feeling overwhelmed, though it might indicate some necessary boundary adjustments between you two.

3. The heavy twelfth-house presence—comprising intuitive and transformational energies—points to a decision rooted in deep psychic or subconscious realms. Since his shift is focused inwardly, it might not directly include you as an active participant; rather, you may be indirectly impacted as the overall relational dynamic adjusts. This could lead to a redefining of roles or a subtle withdrawal on his part as he seeks his internal clarity.

4. An underlying feature is the cross-reference between his 9th house (symbolizing his transformation and new philosophical or spiritual insights) and your Ascendant. This suggests that while his decision is primarily about realigning his own path, the connection between you is marked by a shared experience of confrontation with deeper truths—potentially prompting you to reassess your own stance and involvement.

Based on these elements, the chart indicates that his decision, though fundamentally an inward metamorphosis, is likely to influence you indirectly through shifts in communication, boundaries, and shared dynamics. Whether or not it explicitly includes you depends on how both of you navigate the spatial and psychological distance that this transformation may create.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: I don't understand, can you be more direct?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes: To be direct—Stefan’s decision centers on a deep internal shift. The chart shows that his transformation is driven primarily by inner matters; he’s choosing to focus on healing and restructuring his inner world rather than reaching out actively. Consequently, you may feel his withdrawal or experience tension in communication. His path seems designed for his own evolution even if it indirectly alters the dynamics between you. Simply put, his decision is to turn inward and change his personal life framework, and you will likely be impacted by a noticeable shift in how connected or involved you both feel.
